synopsis: In the first part of their engaging discussion on breakups, hosts Devam and Ahir explore the emotional aftermath of a recent breakup, sharing personal experiences and insights. They emphasize the importance of feeling one's emotions, the healing process, and the necessity of self-reflection, all while encouraging listeners to connect with their feelings and seek support from loved ones.
quotes: Healing means to feel whole by yourself.
Sometimes, to love means to let go.
Feelings are real; if you push them down, they're going to come out in bad ways.
It's okay to talk about your issues, even if you're going through a tough time.
Being around couples kind of sucks, but it's important to be respectful of their happiness.
I realized that I need to plan less and live moment to moment.
You can always find someone who's worse off than you, but that doesn't make your problems any less legitimate.
Traveling was nice, but it prevented me from creating a new routine.
It's tough learning how to spend those moments with yourself.
Sometimes you just need to remind yourself that this too shall pass.
